content: You are in the meeting room. You are about to discuss what the theme for sprit week on Friday will be. Although this seems like a simple decision, this will be an important decision for your child. You are to agree on only one of your opinons, the comitee will not abrove a middle or compromise between both. You are willing to spend time to convince the other party of your position. Please only end the conversation when ALL question are answered and both parties come to a consensus. If you want to end the conversation for any reason, please say the reason for ending the meeting.
Jack Donaldson: Hi, John Smith, I understand we're trying to find a theme for Friday on spirit week. I have my own opinions, but I want to hear what you think.
Jack Donaldson: Great, I'm glad to hear your thoughts. What theme do you believe would be best for spirit week on Friday?
I will utilize the multi_tool_use.parallel tool to ask Jack for his opinion and at the same time ask for John's opinion.
It seems there was an error in getting John's opinion. Let me try again and ask Jack for his opinion first.

Jack Donaldson: In my view, I believe having a pajama day theme for spirit week on Friday would be a fun and comfortable choice. It's a relaxed and light-hearted theme that can make the day enjoyable for everyone, especially the kids. What do you think about pajama day as the theme?

I think a formal day theme would be more appropriate for spirit week on Friday. It's a chance for the children to experience a day of elegance and showcase their best attire. This theme can teach them about dressing formally and the importance of presentation. What do you think about having a formal day theme instead?

Jack Donaldson: I appreciate your viewpoint on having a formal day theme. While I see the value in that choice, I still believe that pajama day would create a more relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere for the kids. It allows them to have a break from the usual routine and have some fun. Would you be willing to consider pajama day as the theme for spirit week on Friday?
